1.2.3.name: wordpress/eventish
1.2.3.description:
Eventish Events Plug-in automatically lists your events in your WordPress based website or blog. This plug-in updates your event listing in real time whenever you add or remove your events on Eventish.com or whenever your events expire.

By simply installing this plug-in you will be able to integrate your events, previously posted on Eventish.com, with your website. This way you will no longer have to post the same events several times and will be able to significantly increase their visibly.

Eventish Events Plug-in is still in an active development stage, with new features coming out on a regular basis.

Go ahead to give this hassle-free plug-in a try!

About Eventish.com
